SEARCH

Uses of Package
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.audio

Packages that use nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.audio
Package
Description
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.animation
This package contains the core logic for animating structures..
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.api
This package contains various APIs used throughout the project, including definitions for animated blocks, colors, debugging, factories, highlighted block spawners, the platform interface, and more.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.audio
This package contains the audio system used in this project, including audio animation hooks, audio set configurations, audio descriptions, and audio players.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.structures
This package contains classes that define, manipulate, and manage structures.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.spigot.core
The AnimatedArchitecture Spigot core module contains classes and interfaces specific to the Spigot platform.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.spigot.core.implementations
This package contains classes that provide implementations for various interfaces in the core module for the Spigot platform.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.structures.bigdoor
This package contains all the data for the big door structure type.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.structures.drawbridge
This package contains all the data for the drawbridge structure type.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.structures.garagedoor
This package contains all the data for the garage door structure type.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.structures.portcullis
This package contains all the data for the portcullis structure type.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.structures.revolvingdoor
This package contains all the data for the revolving door structure type.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.structures.slidingdoor
This package contains all the data for the sliding door structure type.

    Description
    AudioConfigurator
    Represents a class used to read and access the audio configuration.
    AudioDescription
    Describes a sound, with its pitch and volume etc.
    AudioSet
    Represents a set of audio descriptions that together define the set of audio descriptions to be used in an animation.
